title: Traits and Features
content: you, or teleport you to a safer location. Swarmkeeper lv 3 Cloud of Jellyfish Feature You gain a swarm of jellyfish that fights on your side. Once per round, the swarm can assist you in one of three ways after you attack an enemy: it can attack and deal additional Lightning damage, Shock your enemy, or teleport you to a safer location.
